articles.title: Blockstream debuts Simplicity as Bitcoin’s answer to Ethereum’s Solidity
articles.summary: Adam Back’s Blockstream has launched Bitcoin-native smart contract programming language Simplicity, offering an alternative to Ethereum’s Solidity.
